content: short socks are the bane of my existence because they always fall down into my shoes a lot of commercially-made socks prevent this with grippy silicone strips on the inside but that doesn t help when it comes to knitting your own socks so i have been on a quest to figure out how to knit no-show socks that don t fall down after a few steps and i think this is the answer this pattern is only for the cuff and heel tab of the sock and is meant to be used with a flap and gusset heel you can pair it with your favorite vanilla pattern or even with a patterned sock - just start the patterning after you pick up the gusset stitches for the heel don t have a favorite vanilla pattern try mine - it s free 1 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/exceedingly-vanilla-socks
